item.title: Quarterly Earnings Review: Dec 2025 Results Reveal Mixed Trends Across Market Caps
item.description: The December 2025 quarterly earnings season has unfolded with a nuanced picture across India’s equity markets, as 4,094 companies reported results reflecting a cautious yet gradually improving corporate profitability landscape. While the proportion of companies delivering positive results has inched up to 46.0%, sectoral and market capitalisation segments reveal divergent trends that investors should carefully analyse. Time: 1 minute ago

item.title: SBC Exports Ltd Gains 0.56%: Key Milestones and Market Context This Week
item.description: SBC Exports Ltd closed the week ending 27 February 2026 with a modest gain of 0.56%, outperforming the Sensex which declined by 0.96% over the same period. The stock demonstrated resilience amid mixed market conditions, highlighted by reaching both a new 52-week and all-time high on 23 February. Despite some volatility midweek, SBC Exports Ltd maintained its technical strength, supported by consistent volume and positive momentum indicators. Time: 54 minutes ago

item.title: A B Infrabuild Ltd Falls 16.97%: 3 Key Factors Driving the Weekly Decline

This underperformance was stark compared to the Sensex’s modest 0.96% fall over the same period. The week was marked by a new 52-week high early on, followed by heavy selling pressure culminating in a lower circuit hit and a shift in technical momentum, reflecting a complex and volatile trading environment for the stock. item.title: Artemis Medicare Services Ltd’s Mixed Week: -0.40% Price Change Amid Technical Shifts

item.title: Sumitomo Chemical India Ltd Falls 1.62%: Bearish Technicals and Weak Financials Weigh

item.title: Secmark Consultancy Ltd Gains 11.39%: 3 Key Factors Driving the Volatile Week
